quotes.quote: "Whenever I discover exactly why a bug has occured and how to fix it, it always disappears and get replaced with something even more bizarre and inexplicable immediately. And this has occurred so many times!"

quotes.quote: "I wanted to start learning Arduino programming but a starter kit costs more than a hundred dollars! That is basically a large portion of my monthly allowance! How can I afford that?!"

quotes.quote: "I spent so much time trying to find all the electrical components to make a cool rover project I found online. When I finally found the cheapest options available online and tried to pay, they told me that they do not deliver to my country!"
